author: ahinzmann
body:
#### PR description:

Sync PUPPI tune for Phase-2 with Run3 setup (tune v15).
Minor improvements to jet resolution and MET tails are expected from this.

#### PR validation:

Validation plots (thanks @hqucms) can be found here.
[puppiV15_phase2.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/5417507/puppiV15_phase2.pdf)

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

No backport.
title: Sync puppi tune for phase2 with run3
